channel.title: Turning firey red when using a str pot
channel.description: hi, i need help. does anyone know codes on how to turn firey red when using a strength pot/ item

item.title: Turning firey red when using a str pot
item.dc:creator: @2hnderspeckr 2hnderspeckr
item.description:
@2hnderspeckr wrote:

ok ty ill try, but im an intimidiate coder, so ill proberly just stick with the glow for now. i wanna make my server abit like WoW :)well somehting like it… or like you know in cw? some servers have a glow something like that, but for the outline of the body, so your body is in blood/firey red.doing the glow thingy now, but id really appreciate it if some1 did have the codes
[br][size=1]Posted on: January 30, 2007, 03:12:21 PM[/size][hr]alot of spam on topics… lol[br][size=1]Posted on: January 30, 2007, 03:19:11 PM[/size][hr]anyone?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 31, 2007, 10:28:50 AM[/size][hr]:S no help…

item.title: Turning firey red when using a str pot
item.dc:creator: @fozzy fozzy
item.description:
@fozzy wrote:

2hnderspeckr, go into the TuT forums and search for something along the admin glow, it should come up with a TuT that has a red glow around the admin. Then make a code that if you used that item, it would almost be like the admin command for their glow. … I know what I mean, I just can’t quite explain it. If I was at home, I would make the code for you.
